Articles.Content: Edited January 24, 2022 by AtomicTech

Cool! (Nice gif, btw.)

Plock is pretty far away, so I wish you luck!

It would be cool if KSP looked a little older, with dialog boxes like your gif instead of the Kerbal's picture and some text next to it, or some text on the screen.

And with rocket pars more like older ones, and pixelized 3D view, as it were on NES or something like this.

It's hard to wait for the chapters!

Cool! (Nice gif, btw.)

Plock is pretty far away, so I wish you luck! 

Thanks! I'll need all the luck, and time, I can get!

  

31 minutes ago, Nazalassa said:

It would be cool if KSP looked a little older, with dialog boxes like your gif instead of the Kerbal's picture and some text next to it, or some text on the screen.

And with rocket pars more like older ones, and pixelized 3D view, as it were on NES or something like this.

It would be pretty neat!

Who knows, maybe we'll get a try-hard or two, or however many modders we've got active at the moment, who'll make a mod like this for KSP 2!

So, fingers crossed that we'll get the tools for it!
